mainBoard.name: Glint-Horn Buccaneer
mainBoard.originalText:
Haste
Whenever you discard a card, Glint-Horn Buccaneer deals 1 damage to each opponent.
{1}{R}, Discard a card: Draw a card. Activate only if Glint-Horn Buccaneer is attacking.

rulings.text: In a Two-Headed Giant game, Glint-Horn Buccaneer’s triggered ability causes the opposing team to be dealt 1 damage twice.

The middle ability of Glint-Horn Buccaneer is a triggered ability, not an activated ability. It doesn’t allow you to discard a card whenever you want; rather, you need some other way of discarding a card, such as by activating its last ability.

mainBoard.name: Rigging Runner
mainBoard.originalText:
First strike
Raid — Rigging Runner enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked this turn.

rulings.text: Raid abilities care only that you attacked with a creature. It doesn’t matter how many creatures you attacked with, or which opponent or planeswalker controlled by an opponent those creatures attacked.

Raid abilities evaluate the entire turn to see if you attacked with a creature. That creature doesn’t have to still be on the battlefield. Similarly, the player or planeswalker it attacked doesn’t have to still be in the game or on the battlefield, respectively.

El Disparo de cañón ígneo hace 3 puntos de daño a la criatura objetivo.
Incursión — Si atacaste este turno, en vez de eso, el Disparo de cañón ígneo hace 6 puntos de daño.

foreignData.flavorText: La petite taille et le caractère intrépide des gobelins en font de parfaits canonniers.
foreignData.name: Salve de pyrocanon
foreignData.text:
La Salve de pyrocanon inflige 3 blessures à une créature ciblée.
Saccage — La Salve de pyrocanon inflige 6 blessures à la place si vous avez attaqué ce tour-ci.

foreignData.flavorText: La temerarietà e le dimensioni ridotte dei goblin ne fanno cannonieri provetti.
foreignData.name: Salva delle Bocche di Fuoco
foreignData.text:
La Salva delle Bocche di Fuoco infligge 3 danni a una creatura bersaglio.
Incursione — La Salva delle Bocche di Fuoco infligge invece 6 danni se hai attaccato in questo turno.

foreignData.flavorText: ゴブリンは恐れを知らず小柄である。砲手には最適だ。
foreignData.name: 火炎砲発射
foreignData.text:
クリーチャー１体を対象とする。火炎砲発射はそれに３点のダメージを与える。
強襲 ― このターンにあなたが攻撃していたなら、代わりに、火炎砲発射は６点のダメージを与える。

foreignData.flavorText: 鬼怪无所畏惧、身材矮小，是炮手的最佳人选。
foreignData.name: 火炎炮轰击
foreignData.text:
火炎炮轰击对目标生物造成3点伤害。
突击～如果你本回合中攻击过，则改为火炎炮轰击造成6点伤害。

mainBoard.name: Firecannon Blast
mainBoard.originalText:
Firecannon Blast deals 3 damage to target creature.
Raid — Firecannon Blast deals 6 damage instead if you attacked this turn.

rulings.text: Raid abilities care only that you attacked with a creature. It doesn’t matter how many creatures you attacked with, or which opponent or planeswalker controlled by an opponent those creatures attacked.

Raid abilities evaluate the entire turn to see if you attacked with a creature. That creature doesn’t have to still be on the battlefield. Similarly, the player or planeswalker it attacked doesn’t have to still be in the game or on the battlefield, respectively.

mainBoard.text:
Firecannon Blast deals 3 damage to target creature.
Raid — Firecannon Blast deals 6 damage instead if you attacked this turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: Spirits disturbed by ghoulcallers become geists driven by restless anger.

foreignData.flavorText: Von Ghulrufern gestörte Geister werden von niemals enden wollender Wut getrieben.
foreignData.name: Blitzaxt
foreignData.text:
Wirf als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken, eine Karte ab oder bezahle {5}.
Die Blitzaxt fügt einer Kreatur deiner Wahl 5 Schadenspunkte zu.

foreignData.flavorText: Los espíritus perturbados por los llamamuertos se convierten en geists conducidos por una rabia ciega.
foreignData.name: Hacha de relámpagos
foreignData.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar este hechizo, descarta una carta o paga {5}.
El Hacha de relámpagos hace 5 puntos de daño a la criatura objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: Les esprits dérangés par les meneurs de goule deviennent des geists mus par une colère permanente.
foreignData.name: Hache d'éclairs
foreignData.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer ce sort, défaussez-vous d'une carte ou payez {5}.
La Hache d'éclairs inflige 5 blessures à une créature ciblée.

foreignData.flavorText: Gli spiriti disturbati dagli evocaghoul diventano geist posseduti da una rabbia incessante.
foreignData.name: Ascia Folgorante
foreignData.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare questa magia, scarta una carta o paga {5}.
L'Ascia Folgorante infligge 5 danni a una creatura bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: グール呼びに眠りを妨げられた霊は、安息なき怒りに駆られて亡霊となる。
foreignData.name: 稲妻の斧
foreignData.text:
この呪文を唱えるための追加コストとして、カード１枚を捨てるか{5}を支払う。
クリーチャー１体を対象とする。稲妻の斧はそれに５点のダメージを与える。

foreignData.flavorText: 受尸鬼牧者侵扰的鬼魂成为受无尽愤怒驱使的游魂。
foreignData.name: 闪电斧
foreignData.text:
弃一张牌或支付{5}，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。
闪电斧对目标生物造成5点伤害。

mainBoard.name: Lightning Axe
mainBoard.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card or pay {5}.
Lightning Axe deals 5 damage to target creature.

rulings.text: The mana value of Lightning Axe is 1, no matter which additional cost you paid.

mainBoard.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card or pay {5}.
Lightning Axe deals 5 damage to target creature.

foreignData.flavorText: Man sollte auf wirklich ALLES vorbereitet sein.
foreignData.name: Tasche des Tragens
foreignData.text:
Immer wenn du eine Karte abwirfst, schicke sie aus deinem Friedhof ins Exil.
{2}, {T}: Ziehe eine Karte und wirf dann eine Karte ab.
{4}, {T}, opfere die Tasche des Tragens: Bringe alle Karten, die von der Tasche des Tragens ins Exil geschickt wurden, auf die Hand ihrer Besitzer zurück.

foreignData.flavorText: No es posible estar demasiado preparado.
foreignData.name: Bolsa de contención
foreignData.text:
Siempre que descartes una carta, exilia esa carta de tu cementerio.
{2}, {T}: Roba una carta, luego descarta una carta.
{4}, {T}, sacrificar la Bolsa de contención: Regresa todas las cartas exiliadas con la Bolsa de contención a la mano de su propietario.

foreignData.flavorText: On n'est jamais trop bien préparé.
foreignData.name: Sac sans fond
foreignData.text:
À chaque fois que vous vous défaussez d'une carte, exilez cette carte de votre cimetière.
{2}, {T} : Piochez une carte, puis défaussez-vous d'une carte.
{4}, {T}, sacrifiez le Sac sans fond : Renvoyez toutes les cartes exilées par le Sac sans fond dans la main de leur propriétaire.

foreignData.flavorText: Non si è mai troppo preparati.
foreignData.name: Borsa Conservante
foreignData.text:
Ogniqualvolta scarti una carta, esilia quella carta dal tuo cimitero.
{2}, {T}: Pesca una carta, poi scarta una carta.
{4}, {T}, Sacrifica la Borsa Conservante: Fai tornare in mano ai rispettivi proprietari tutte le carte esiliate con la Borsa Conservante.

foreignData.flavorText: 準備のし過ぎなどというものはない。
foreignData.name: 保有の鞄
foreignData.text:
あなたがカード１枚を捨てるたび、あなたの墓地にあるそのカードを追放する。
{2},{T}：カード１枚を引き、その後カード１枚を捨てる。
{4},{T},保有の鞄を生け贄に捧げる：保有の鞄によって追放されたカードをすべてそれらのオーナーの手札に戻す。

foreignData.flavorText: 没有哪种准备程度比得上准备过度。
foreignData.name: 百宝囊
foreignData.text:
每当你弃一张牌时，将该牌从你的坟墓场放逐。
{2}，{T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。
{4}，{T}，牺牲百宝囊：将所有以百宝囊放逐的牌移回其拥有者的手上。

mainBoard.name: Bag of Holding
mainBoard.originalText:
Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.
{2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Bag of Holding: Return all cards exiled with Bag of Holding to their owner's hand.

rulings.text: If Bag of Holding is moved to exile when you sacrifice it (most likely due to Leyline of the Void's effect), it remains in exile. It won't be returned to your hand.

If Bag of Holding leaves the battlefield, the items it contained are exiled forever (and, perhaps, scattered throughout the Astral Plane). If the same Bag of Holding card returns to the battlefield, it's considered a new object without access to the cards stored by the old object.
If you control more than one Bag of Holding, you choose which one will hold the discarded card. Other Bags of Holding can't return that card.
If you discard a card but that card is not in your graveyard as Bag of Holding's first ability resolves, that card remains wherever it has moved.
You both draw and discard while Bag of Holding's second ability is resolving. No player may take any action—nor can anything else happen—until you've both drawn and discarded.

mainBoard.text:
Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.
{2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Bag of Holding: Return all cards exiled with Bag of Holding to their owner's hand.

mainBoard.flavorText: Sky pirates often leap randomly into the fray and assume there will be something to land on.

foreignData.flavorText: Himmelspiraten stürzen sich oft wahllos ins Getümmel und verlassen sich darauf, dass sie auf irgendetwas landen werden.
foreignData.name: Waghalsige Piraterie
foreignData.text: Zu Beginn des Kampfes in deinem Zug erzeugst du einen 1/1 roten Pirat-Kreaturenspielstein mit Bedrohlichkeit und Eile. Schicke ihn zu Beginn des nächsten Endsegments ins Exil.

foreignData.flavorText: Los piratas aéreos suelen lanzarse a la batalla de un salto, asumiendo que habrá algo sobre lo que aterrizar.
foreignData.name: Piratería arriesgada
foreignData.text: Al comienzo del combate en tu turno, crea una ficha de criatura Pirata roja 1/1 con las habilidades de amenaza y prisa. Exíliala al comienzo del próximo paso final.

foreignData.flavorText: Les pirates célestes se jettent parfois dans la mêlée en partant du principe qu'ils pourront atterrir quelque part.
foreignData.name: Piraterie audacieuse
foreignData.text: Au début du combat pendant votre tour, créez un jeton de créature 1/1 rouge Pirate avec la menace et la célérité. Exilez-le au début de la prochaine étape de fin.

foreignData.flavorText: I pirati dei cieli spesso si lanciano nella mischia alla cieca, aspettandosi di trovare qualcosa su cui atterrare.
foreignData.name: Pirateria Audace
foreignData.text: All'inizio del combattimento nel tuo turno, crea una pedina creatura Pirata 1/1 rossa con minacciare e rapidità. Esiliala all'inizio della prossima sottofase finale.

foreignData.flavorText: 空の海賊はしばしば、きっと着地先があるだろうとの仮定のもと、場当たり的に戦いに飛び込む。
foreignData.name: 果敢な海賊行為
foreignData.text: あなたのターンの戦闘の開始時に、威迫と速攻を持つ赤の１/１の海賊・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する。次の終了ステップの開始時に、それを追放する。

foreignData.flavorText: 飞空盗经常随性冲入战局，总能为自己找到落脚处。
foreignData.name: 大胆盗虐
foreignData.text: 在你回合的战斗开始时，派出一个1/1红色，具威慑与敏捷异能的海盗衍生生物。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它放逐。

mainBoard.name: Daring Piracy
mainBoard.originalText: At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 red Pirate creature token with menace and haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
mainBoard.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 red Pirate creature token with menace and haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

mainBoard.flavorText: As eons passed, the rock wore away, revealing the rich colors at the mountain's heart.

foreignData.flavorText: Im Laufe der Äonen wurde der Fels abgetragen, sodass die satten Farben im Herzen des Gebirges sichtbar wurden.
foreignData.name: Gedeihende Felsklippe
foreignData.text:
Die Gedeihende Felsklippe kommt getappt ins Spiel.
Sowie die Gedeihende Felsklippe ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Rot.
{T}: Erzeuge {R} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: A medida que pasaban los siglos, la roca se iba erosionando, revelando así los bellos colores del corazón de la montaña.
foreignData.name: Risco floreciente
foreignData.text:
El Risco floreciente entra al campo de batalla girado.
En cuanto el Risco floreciente entre al campo de batalla, elige un color que no sea rojo.
{T}: Agrega {R} o un maná del color elegido.

foreignData.flavorText: Au fil des éons, la pierre s'est érodée, révélant les couleurs vives du cœur de la montagne.
foreignData.name: Promontoire prospère
foreignData.text:
Le Promontoire prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.
Au moment où le Promontoire prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez une couleur autre que le rouge.
{T} : Ajoutez {R} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: Col passare delle ere, la pietra si erose, rivelando i brillanti colori nel cuore della montagna.
foreignData.name: Falesia Florida
foreignData.text:
La Falesia Florida entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.
Mentre la Falesia Florida entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli un colore diverso dal rosso.
{T}: Aggiungi {R} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: 悠久の時を経て岩肌は削られ、山の中心の豊かな色彩が露わになった。
foreignData.name: 興隆する絶壁
foreignData.text:
興隆する絶壁はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
興隆する絶壁が戦場に出るに際し、赤でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{R} か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: 无数世代过去，石头磨损，显露出高山核心处的丰富颜色。
foreignData.name: 兴旺绝壁
foreignData.text:
兴旺绝壁须横置进战场。
于兴旺绝壁进战场时，选择一种红色以外的颜色。
{T}：加{R}或一点所选颜色的法术力。

mainBoard.name: Thriving Bluff
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Bluff enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Bluff enters the battlefield, choose a color other than red.
{T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.
mainBoard.text:
Thriving Bluff enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than red.
{T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.
